kobe.KBpointings.tilings¶

class kobe.KBpointings.tilings(logger=None, **kwargs)¶

tilings: Generate, read and process tilings

See also

kobe.galaxies, kobe.pointings

Notes

tilings inherients from vtilings and circulate, and inheriented by pointings.

hpmapm
